get.description: Retrieves the order detail for a given order numeric id. If not found empty class is returned. For working with open orders recommended to use OpenOrders/GetOpenOrdersDetails Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode Rate limit: 250 / minute

Retrieves the order detail for a unique system order id identifier (pkOrderId) For working with open orders recommended to use OpenOrders/GetOpenOrdersDetails Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

post.description: Retrieves the order detail list for a list of order id identifiers (pkOrderId) For working with open orders recommended to use OpenOrders/GetOpenOrdersDetails Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode Rate limit: 250 / minute

Retrieves order packaging, weight and dimension information with split packaging. The method can perform ad hoc recalculation and saving of any changes. Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.description: Orders to get packaging calculations for

post.description: Designed to recalculate order packaging totals based on the object provided Permissions Required: GlobalPermissions.OrderBook.ViewOrderDetailsNode Rate limit: 150 / minute

parameters.name: request
parameters.description:
Request with list of OrderItemSerialModel as property. Each entry represents an OrderItemRowId and a list of collections of serial data. Seperated by correlation (quantity for this row) 
            Note there can be one collection of serial data for each physical item being shipped - e.g. an order item with quantity of 2 can have 2 collections of serial data

post.description: Get order item row serial information by requested order ids. Maximum requested orderIds is 25. Rate limit: 150 / minute

GetOrderPackagingCalculationRequest.description: Request class for GetOrderPackagingCalculationRequest method in Orders controller

pkOrderIds.description: List of order ids for which the packaging information should be returned, recalculated, saved

Recalculate.description: Flag to indicate that recalculation is necessary

SaveRecalculation.description: Flag to indicate that after recalculation the results should be saved back to the database

request.description: Request object with data to be saved in the database
Request object with data to be saved in the database

SetOrderPackagingRequest.description: Request class for SetOrderPackaging method in Orders controller

fkPackagingTypeId.description: Packaging Type Id. It has to be one of types available for selected Group Id

pkOrderId.description: Order Id to set the order packaging data

ManualAdjust.description: Indicate if this data is manually adjusted with the rest of fields or is auto calculated

IsAutoSplit.description: Indicates whether the order should be auto split. Usually via the 3D packaging methods.

request.description: Request with OrderId and BasicExtendedProperties as fields

OrderId.description: Order id of the order to append extended properties to

ExtendedProperties.description: Array of basic extended properties to be added

ExtendedPropertiesInserted.description: The number of extended properties that were added

Errors.description: An array of errors created when attempting to add

BatchAssignmentMode.description: The way in which batches should be assigned

fulfilmentCenter.description: Location to get the orders for
Location to get the orders for
Location to get the orders for

orderIds.description: List of orders to mark as label printed
List of orders to mark as label printed

OrderIds.description: A list of orders that should be assigned the IsPrinted value

BatchAssignmentMode.description: If stock batches needs to be assigned this defines how they should be assigned

orderIds.description: List of order IDs to run rules on

ruleId.description: Id of Rule to run. Null if all rules should be run

tag.description: new tag. null to remove the tag

orderIds.description: list of order ids to be assigned
list of order ids to be assigned

fulfillmentStatusToApply.description: Optional fulfilment status to be applied to successfully moved orders

OrdersMoved.description: List of orders that were moved

KeyedErrors.description: Dictionary of keyed errors. These are the same errors as per the Errors property, but indexable by orderId

loadItems.description: Load or not the order items information

loadAdditionalInfo.description: Load or not the order additional info

loadItems.description: Load or not the orders items information

loadAdditionalInfo.description: Load or not the orders additional info

createdDate.description: The datetime that the item was added to the order

Cost.description: Price Per Unit of each service item

Quantity.description: Quantity of the service item. Optional, defaults to 1.

DiscountPercentage.description: Discount percentage applied to the service item. Optional, defaults to 0.

AddedDate.description: Holds the datetime that the service was added to the order

orderItem.description: The order item to be updated

recalcPackaging.description: Whether or not to recalculate the order packaging

fulfillmentStatus.description: Optional, if provided the fulfillment status for the newly created orders will be set to this

scanPerformed.description: Indicate if the scan has been performed

context.description: Information about where the call came from
Information about where the call came from

wasDraft.description: Indicate if the order was a draft before this operation

TrackingNumber.description: Order tracking number provided by courier

ManualAdjust.description: If there is an adjustment to shipping cost was made

saveToCrm.description: Whether to save the shipping address into CRM, default = false

OrderItemRowId.description: The Row Id for the order item

AdditionalInfo.description: A list of additional information to update or delete from the order item

initialQuantity.description: Initial quantity once the inventory item has been created

ProcessOrderByOrderIdOrReferenceRequest.description: A request used to process an order by id or reference

OrderOrReferenceId.description: The order id or reference id

LocationId.description: The location to process the order from

ScansPerformed.description: Defines if the batches have been scanned

OrderProcessingNotesAcknowledged.description: Have the processing notes been acknowledged

WorkflowJobId.description: Workflow job id that the order is supposed to belong to

ProcessOrderByOrderIdOrReferenceResponse.description: A response class used when processing an order by order id or reference

Message.description: A message - Provided if there have been errors

Response.description: A response object used if further action is required

OrderId.description: The ID of the order - Guid empty if not found

OrderSummary.description: Used when an order has been processed

Items.description: The items that need to be scanned - If any
